Legal_Issue: Can the court grant a retroactive extension of time for Centre Ice to appeal the Trademarks Opposition Board's decision?
Procedural_Stage: Post-decision appeal stage, application for extension of time to appeal
Evidence_Assessment: Court found an arguable appeal and no prejudice to respondent, but lack of evidence regarding good reason for delay after June 16, 1995
Decision_Outcome: Motion for extension of time to appeal dismissed
Burden_of_Proof: Applicant (Centre Ice) bore burden to justify delay and show good reason
Legal_Rule: Under s. 56(1) of the Trade-marks Act, appeals must be filed within two months unless the court allows further time. Factors include an arguable appeal, no prejudice to the respondent, genuine intention to appeal, and good reason for delay.
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness and discretion in granting extension of time
Procedural_Issue: Failure to meet statutory deadline for filing appeal
Grounds_for_Claim: Centre Ice opposed NHL's trademark registration
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached; appeal not permitted due to procedural bar
Judicial_Review_Outcome: Application for leave to appeal dismissed
Review_Standard: Discretionary review of extension request under statutory framework
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: No finding of unfairness, but procedural requirements strictly applied
Key_Evidence_Considered: Timing of nullity request resolution, Centre Ice's delay after June 16, 1995
Legal_Framework: Canadian trademark law, administrative appeal procedures
Applicant_Challenge: Seeking retroactive extension of time to file appeal
Court_Result: Dismissed application for extension; costs awarded to NHL
Standard_of_Proof: Balance of probabilities, with emphasis on justification for delay
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence of deadlines, procedural filings, and correspondence
Remedy_Requested: Extension of time to file appeal
Remedy_Sought: Leave to appeal Trademarks Opposition Board decision
Claimant_Status: Applicant before the Trademarks Opposition Board, moving party in motion for extension
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Failure to file appeal within statutory period without sufficient justification for delay
Applicable_Process: Appeal from administrative board decision under statutory timeline
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Application for extension of time to appeal
